intercity rail started operations in 2011 with 2 stations in Jiangmen.  Trains run at top speeds of 125mph-150mph.  20% of the trains are express trains that skip stations for even faster transit time.

value: Jiangmen currently has 2 stations (Jiangmen and Xinhui) on the east-west spur line.  From
, you can take a spur line train.  The cost from Guangzhou to Xinhui is ¥30 and the trip takes 40 minutes.
The main north-south line is still under construction.  From northern
stations, take a main line train to Xiaolan station and transfer to a spur line train.  Note Zhuhai stations are still under construction so it will take a 30min bus ride from
Gongbei border crossing.  Timetable for extension from Macau border crossings (both Gongbei and Hengqin) and Zhuhai Airport is currently unknown.
When you want to vitist Jiangmen from Guangzhou Baiyun Airport, you can take Intercity Bus
to there. And the beginning time from Baiyun Airport is 08:50 am(beijing time).
